CustomField.description: The strategic goals that this partnership aims to address. Funding requests for $3,000 and under must meet three criteria; $3,001-$5,000 must meet five; $5,001 and over must meet seven.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The strategic goals that this partnership aims to address. Funding requests for $3,000 and under must meet three criteria; $3,001-$5,000 must meet five; $5,001 and over must meet seven.
CustomField.label: Funding Criteria

value.fullName: Helps to overcome barriers to business growth.
value.label: Helps to overcome barriers to business growth.

value.fullName: Increases profitability or productivity, or stimulates domestic or foreign investment.
value.label: Increases profitability or productivity, or stimulates domestic or foreign investment.

value.fullName: Improves diversity, equity and inclusion, in the sector or in service delivery.
value.label: Improves diversity, equity and inclusion, in the sector or in service delivery.

value.fullName: Improves availability of, access to or geographic diversity in physical space.
value.label: Improves availability of, access to or geographic diversity in physical space.

value.fullName: Increases domestic sales or supports engagement with domestic organizations.
value.label: Increases domestic sales or supports engagement with domestic organizations.

value.fullName: Increases exports, improves international reputation or supports the development of
value.label: Increases exports, improves international reputation or supports the development of

value.fullName: Promotes the sector, within the Toronto Region or externally.
value.label: Promotes the sector, within the Toronto Region or externally.

value.fullName: Strengthens internal networks and collaboration within the sector.
value.label: Strengthens internal networks and collaboration within the sector.

value.fullName: Supports innovation within or technology transfer to the sector.
value.label: Supports innovation within or technology transfer to the sector.
